channel.title: [MySQL] Connecting to DB and reading admins from table
channel.description: Hello i have a server Rune-Warfare its 317 and i want it to connect to my MySQL dabatase and read admins from a table i have searched forums but none of the tutorials worked for me can someone please help me thanks :)
